Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polynomial

  • public class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a polynomial, an expression of terms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polynomial()
      Creates a Polynomial object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTerm(int coeff, int expo)
      Adds a term to the polynomial in the proper position (exponents in ascending order).
      Polynomial polyAdd(Polynomial p)
      Adds one polynomial with another and returns the sum.
      Polynomial polyMultiply(Polynomial p)
      Multiples one polynomial with another and returns the product.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the Polynomial object.

        Adds a term to the polynomial in the proper position (exponents in ascending order).
